product.title: RED by KISS Titanium Styler Pencil Flat Iron 3/10" – Ultra-Precise Edge & Pixie Cut Styling, 450°F Max Heat, Frizz-Free, Instant Temperature Control, Professional & Home Use
product.description: Red by Kiss Pencil Flat Iron Hair Straightener (Titanium, 3/10" (0.3 Inch)). The Titanium treated plates enhance even heat distribution, eliminating cold spots while conditioning hair for shinier, sleeker results. Lasting durability under high heat temps.
product.description_html: Red by Kiss Pencil Flat Iron Hair Straightener (Titanium, 3/10" (0.3 Inch)). The Titanium treated plates enhance even heat distribution, eliminating cold spots while conditioning hair for shinier, sleeker results. Lasting durability under high heat temps.
product.description_full:
Red by Kiss Pencil Flat Iron Hair Straightener (Titanium, 3/10" (0.3 Inch)). The Titanium treated plates enhance even heat distribution, eliminating cold spots while conditioning hair for shinier, sleeker results. Lasting durability under high heat temps. * Ultra-Thin 3/10" Titanium Plates – Designed for precise styling, perfect for pixie cuts, edges, short hair, and detailed styling
 * 450°F Max Heat – Achieve salon-quality results with high heat for sleek, straight styles while eliminating frizz
 * Instant Variable Temperature Control – Customizable heat settings with an easy-to-use on/off button for all hair types
 * Superior Heat Distribution – Ensures even heat across the plates for consistent, smooth results without hot spots
 * Prevents Heat Damage – Advanced titanium technology preserves hair moisture while reducing frizz and breakage
product.description_full_html:
Red by Kiss Pencil Flat Iron Hair Straightener (Titanium, 3/10" (0.3 Inch)). The Titanium treated plates enhance even heat distribution, eliminating cold spots while conditioning hair for shinier, sleeker results. Lasting durability under high heat temps.
  • Ultra-Thin 3/10" Titanium Plates – Designed for precise styling, perfect for pixie cuts, edges, short hair, and detailed styling
  • 450°F Max Heat – Achieve salon-quality results with high heat for sleek, straight styles while eliminating frizz
  • Instant Variable Temperature Control – Customizable heat settings with an easy-to-use on/off button for all hair types
  • Superior Heat Distribution – Ensures even heat across the plates for consistent, smooth results without hot spots
  • Prevents Heat Damage – Advanced titanium technology preserves hair moisture while reducing frizz and breakage

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
